author: stahlleiton
body:
Solves https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-466

Description:
- Add labels for the link number vs. BX histograms
- Set minimum of the y axis range to 0 for hwCharge, hwSign, (hw)phi/(hw)phiAtVtx plots
- Create an input link vs. charge 2d plot
title: OnlineDQM: uGMT DQM plot improvements CMSLITDPG-466
